name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. David L. BRADFORD, Respondent

judges: Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. David L. BRADFORD, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of January 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
Whether the Superior Court erred in ruling that the trial court was correct in determining that the Commonwealth did not act with due diligence in bringing respondent to trial?
Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
12 A.3d 288
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. David L. BRADFORD, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 12, 2011.
